articles.title: बुद्ध पूर्णिमा के दिन लुम्बिनी में पीएम मोदी, बुद्ध के जरिए 'अद्वितीय' मित्र नेपाल को साधेंगे

articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: China's economy cools sharply in April as lockdowns bite
articles.description: Retail sales in April shrank 11.1% from a year earlier, the biggest contraction since March 2020. Covid-19 lockdowns took a heavy toll on consumption, industrial production and employment in China.
articles.content: China's economy cools sharply in April as lockdowns bite
